categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic droids

nodes.text: Tee-Six was a droid that accompanied Amilyn Holdo, a former senator apprentice, aboard the Rebel Alliance arms-smuggling ship Candor sometime between 2 BBY and 4 ABY. Tee-Six helped Holdo with tasks such as watering the ship's plants and checking its systems. When the ship was attacked by an Imperial Star Destroyer, Holdo asked the droid what happened to the lights, but Tee-Six gave no answer. After the attack, the Candor was able to escape with few casualties thanks to Holdo's command skills.
Tee-Six had white plating and a red sensor and was mounted to the wall of the Candor.

Tee-Six appeared in the comic story "The Bridge,"  published by Marvel Comics in Age of Resistance Special 1 on July 31, 2019. The story was written by Chris Eliopoulos and illustrated by Elsa Charretier and Nick Filardi.
